string.name: alert_msg_not_found
string.description: ASUS ZenUI Services is not found on device

resources.string: Non hai installato ASUS ZenUI Services!\n\nVuoi scaricarlo e installarlo adesso?

string.name: alert_msg_client_update
string.description: Client app is not support, need update client app

resources.string: Nuova versione di %1$s disponibile, installa ora.

string.name: alert_msg_azs_update
string.description: ASUS ZenUI Services is not support, need update ASUS ZenUI Services

resources.string: %1$s richiede l\'ultima versione di ASUS ZenUI Services, installa ora.

string.name: alert_msg_compatible
string.description: Client app version is compatible with ASUS ZenUI Services

resources.string: La versione di %1$s \u00e8 compatibile con ASUS ZenUI Services.

string.name: alert_msg_match
string.description: Client app version is match with ASUS ZenUI Services

resources.string: La versione di %1$s coincide con ASUS ZenUI Services.
